html:
Announcing Fall 2025 Workshops

Early Bird Savings!

Hello Kotliner!

The second half of 2025 is the perfect time to invest in your professional growth. To help you master Kotlin and advance your career, we‚Äôve just opened enrollment for our live, expert-led fall workshops.

Here is our open workshop schedule:

Kotlin for Developers

Perfect for those starting their journey or wanting a comprehensive foundation. This workshop covers everything a developer needs to start using Kotlin confidently and effectively.

üìÖ Dates: September 10‚Äì12, 2025 (9:00‚Äì17:00 CEST)

üí∞ Pricing: Save ‚Ç¨300!

Register by August 10th for the special price of ‚Ç¨500, (‚Ç¨600 till Sept 10, regular price ‚Ç¨800)

‚û°Ô∏è Learn More & Register

Advanced Compose

Ready to take your Android UI skills to the next level? Dive into advanced patterns, architecture, and optimization techniques in Jetpack Compose.

üìÖ Dates: September 18‚Äì19, 2025 (9:00‚Äì17:00 CEST)

üí∞ Pricing: Get the early bird price of ‚Ç¨500 when you register by August 18th, (Regular price ‚Ç¨600)

‚û°Ô∏è Learn More & Register

üèÜ Kotlin Mastery

One of our most popular workshops! Go beyond the syntax to master safe, efficient, and idiomatic Kotlin programming that will make your code shine.

üìÖ Dates: October 23‚Äì24, 2025 (9:00‚Äì17:00 CEST)

üí∞ Pricing: Save 50%! The price is just ‚Ç¨300 until August 23rd, (‚Ç¨400 till Sept 23, regular price ‚Ç¨600)

‚û°Ô∏è Learn More & Register

Kotlin Expert

For the experienced developer. Explore the most advanced Kotlin tools, design strategies, and powerful patterns to solve complex problems with elegance.

üìÖ Dates: December 18‚Äì19, 2025 (9:00‚Äì17:00 CET)

üí∞ Pricing: Register by September 18th to get the best price of ‚Ç¨400, (‚Ç¨500 till Nov 18, regular price ‚Ç¨600)

‚û°Ô∏è Learn More & Register

All our workshops are live, interactive experiences led by industry experts.

Register early to take advantage of significant savings!

Looking for our Coroutines workshop? We‚Äôve been working on something even better.

Stay tuned for more details!

All the best,

The Kt. Academy Team
